artist: Painter: After Gabriël Metsu; Lithographer: Gustav Wolff
description: a Dutch interior with a young woman seated, making bobbin lace; cat on a box at her feet; painting on wall behind
inscription:
Signature,Title, Date and Inscription

below image on sheet in black: Gemalt von Gabril Metsu   Lithogr. von G. Wolff 1840 / DIE SPITZENKLÖPPLERN / (Dresdener Galerie) / 65 | on sheet in pencil: 2-59
title: The Lace Maker
